Sentencas: Energy storage becomes increasingly significant for addressing imbalance of grid supply and demand.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: In this paper, a new cogeneration system based on combined compressed air energy storage (CAES), solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), gas turbine (GT) and organic Rankine cycle (ORC) is proposed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: SOFC-GT system replaces GT combustor of traditional CAES, and SOFC-GT can operate with high efficiency at peak time.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: At the same time, ORC is employed to recover the exhaust from GT.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: Especially, in the new system, the surplus electricity is utilized to compress air, thus eliminating power consumption of air compressor in conventional SOFC-GT.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: Additionally, the system can also provide heat and power for small-scale distributed generation application users.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: The combined system is simulated based on Aspen plus and embedded Fortran.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: The energy, exergy analysis and parametric sensitivity analysis are used to evaluate the system performance.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: The results revealed that the round-trip efficiency, exergetic round-trip efficiency and discharging electrical efficiency are 76.07%, 61.78% and 72.39%, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: Compared with an integrated SOFC-GT-ORC system without energy storage, the electrical efficiency of the new system increases by 17.07%.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage

Sentencas: Overall, the combined system can achieve high efficiencies, which can provide important theoretical guidance for efficient energy utilization.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a novel cogeneration system combining solid oxide fuel cell, gas turbine, organic Rankine cycle with compressed air energy storage
